content.question: Which of the following was the most direct effect of the trend described in the excerpt?

choices.label: The development of the Progressive movement to address social problems associated with industrial society
The emergence of the Populist Partyâ€™s efforts to increase the role of government in the economy
The election of large numbers of women to political offices
The increased participation of women in factory work

content.answer: The development of the Progressive movement to address social problems associated with industrial society

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
